mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(A.LEVEL_CODE,'') AS levelCode, IFNULL(A.LEVEL_NAME,'') AS levelName, IFNULL(B.SCIENTIFIC_NAME,'') AS scientificName, IFNULL(B.LOCAL_NAME,'') AS localName, IFNULL(A.CLASSESTREE_CODE,'') AS classestreeCode FROM pd_classestree AS A LEFT JOIN pd_classestree_mat AS B ON ( A.CLASSESTREE_CODE = B.CLASSESTREE_CODE ) WHERE A.CLASSESTREE_CODE = #{filterMap.classestreeCode} AND A.DEL_FLG=#{filterMap.delFlg}
